mapper.select: select co.*, cmc.large_name, me.nick, me.member_no, map.lat, map.lng, map.detailaddress, img.image_no from commu co left join cmc cmc on co.middlename = cmc.middle_name left join member me on co.member_no = me.member_no left join map map on co.map_no = map.map_no left join mei mei on co.member_no = mei.member_no left join image img on img.image_no = mei.image_no where commu_no = #{commuNo}

select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.* from ( select co.commu_no, co.title, co.regdate, me.nick, CIF.image_no from commu co left outer join commu_img_first CIF on co.commu_no = CIF.commu_no left join member me on co.member_no = me.member_no where middlename = #{middleName} and co.hiddenyn = 'N' order by commu_no desc )TMP ) where rn between ${startRow} and ${endRow}
select * from commu where hiddenyn = 'N' order by commu_no desc

select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.* from ( select co.commu_no, co.title, co.regdate, me.nick, CIF.image_no from commu co left outer join commu_img_first CIF on co.commu_no = CIF.commu_no left join member me on co.member_no = me.member_no left join cmc cmc on co.middlename = cmc.middle_name where cmc.large_name = #{largeName} and co.hiddenyn = 'N' order by commu_no desc )TMP ) where rn between ${startRow} and ${endRow}
select * from cmc where large_name = '커뮤니티' and instr(urlpath, '/map') > 0

select * from ( select rownum rn, TMP.* from ( select co.commu_no, co.title, co.regdate, me.nick, CIF.image_no from commu co left outer join commu_img_first CIF on co.commu_no = CIF.commu_no left join member me on co.member_no = me.member_no left join cmc cmc on co.middlename = cmc.middle_name where co.middlename = #{middlename} order by commu_no desc )TMP ) where rn between 1 and 3
